channel.title: Z.epsity 2000+ Downloads
channel.description:
Downloads: (Changed google to google for some reason it changes google to google...) lol cant even say the name of server CHANGE GOOGLE TO THE WORD IN THIS PICTURE http://prntscr.com/9lrs6
[size=14pt]- Removed the char files; right click in data folder, new folder, rename Characters[/size]
[quote="whattehp406"]Here for all of you idiots who don't want to download because char files are still there. [url=http://ageofcrisis.co.cc/downloads/zcleaned.rar]DOWNLOAD[/url] ha 11MB original was 60MB
[code="lul my first readme"]google created by Artesia I, Whattehp406 only cleaned it and added a cool "push" feature. Basically what it does is it grabs the dev version backs it up and then puts it in the official client folder. Still working on a backup system for the server but eh. Anyway as many requested:
- Removed the char files; right click in data folder, new folder, rename Characters - Removed the useless data in bin; - Cleared all the logs; - Renamed the folders, haven't touched the server yet; - Note that i changed the cache dir in signlink.java; - Made a cool push system for you all to use.
I take no credit for this.[/code][/quote]
http://uppit.com/icaig1708c2q/google_Client_(Fullscreen).rar
http://uppit.com/jbm80yutj46i/google.rar
http://uppit.com/34n2b2sj2pxg/Cache.rar
FUCKIGN READ THIS** MemLeakFixed = RUN.BAT ... signlink.java change .google to ur new cache folder name!
Well the guys that i worked with fucked my over. Im a Jerk and i created this source so yah here you go.... Tbh this server is not that great but maybe good for some people
THIS IS NOT LEECHED DON"T SAY IT IS I HAVE RELEASED IT WITH THIS CURRENT NAME (ARTESIA) ON ALL THE SITES! YOU MAY LEECH IT IF U WANT SO HAVE FUN :D
Credits: Sanity 50% Myself 20% Im a Jerk 10% Everyone Else 20%
Features: - Maxed (all 99s) on Start up for PKing right away! - Perfect COMBAT System. (with PKPoints shop) - Working Torva/Pernix/Virtus with effects! - Loading ALL RS items - Working FULLSCREEN client (Real Fullscreen not just re-sizeable) - FULL 100% SUMMONING working with other Skills - OVERLOADS/EXTREME potions! - full-proof working AUTOCAST (right click on barrage) - KORASI SPECIAL FULLY WORKING - All spirit shields/sigils! - 100% Jad for Fire cape - Donator Zone and Rewards. - Corp, Tormented demon - Dclaws, Godswords, Chaotics 100% working - ALL minigames fully working (PEST CONTROL, BARROWS, DUEL ARENA, you name it!) - 24/7 Online - Amazing Donor benefits - 100% Turmoil + SS - 100% Hybriding and Switching - 100% PKing - 100% Fun PK - 4 Custom Quests - made by myself- not that great but pretty cool - gives u mor stuff to do - I got fucked over before i could finish my interface for staff commands (the pic below) so you gotta finish ur self....
Also in ur post if u want me to make another one but better just put in it -New1
Pictures:
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/240yygx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2yv44nn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/i1wu1w.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/k1qom0.png[/img]
Links:
Server Link: [url=http://uppit.com/jbm80yutj46i/google.rar]http://uppit.com/jbm80yutj46i/google.rar[/url] --- Still Has Character Files so yah my bad
Client Link : [url=http://uppit.com/icaig1708c2q/google_Client_(Fullscreen).rar]http://uppit.com/icaig1708c2q/google_Client_(Fullscreen).rar[/url]
Cache Link : [url=http://uppit.com/34n2b2sj2pxg/Cache.rar]http://uppit.com/34n2b2sj2pxg/Cache.rar[/url]
